questions.text: Jaromir Jagr of the NHL was traded to the Washington Capitals in 2001.
Who won the 1998 FIFA World Cup?
What sport did Luis Hernandez play in 2000?
questions.explanation:
Soccer.

	He played for Mexico, wearing number 15.

questions.text: The 2010 Winter Olympics going to be held in Toronto.
What number did Wayne Gretzky wear?
questions.explanation:
99.

	He is also known as 'The Great One'.
